Sentencas: Direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells (DC-SOFCs), energy conversion devices with an all-solid-state structure, utilize solid carbon as a fuel to generate electricity in a green and efficient manner.
Titulo: Highly efficient direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells operated with camellia oleifera biomass

Sentencas: Recently, the use of biomassderived carbon as a DC-SOFC fuel has become a key research topic owing to the abundance and renewability of biomass.
Titulo: Highly efficient direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells operated with camellia oleifera biomass

Sentencas: Thus far, for the majority of studies, an anaerobic pyrolysis process is usually needed for converting the biomass to biochar prior to applying DC-SOFCs.
Titulo: Highly efficient direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells operated with camellia oleifera biomass

Sentencas: In this study, DC-SOFCs were assembled with perovskite-type La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-delta (LSGM) and Ag-Gd0.2Ce0.8O2-delta as the electrolyte and electrodes, respectively.
Titulo: Highly efficient direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells operated with camellia oleifera biomass

Sentencas: The electrochemical performance and stability were evaluated for two types of DC-SOFCs: those filled with Camellia oleifera shell biomass as the fuel and those filled with biochar derived from the biomass.
Titulo: Highly efficient direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells operated with camellia oleifera biomass

Sentencas: The biomass-filled DCSOFC achieved a maximum power density of 306 mW cm-2 at 800 degrees C, which is close to that of the biochar-filled DC-SOFC (317 mW cm-2).
Titulo: Highly efficient direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells operated with camellia oleifera biomass

Sentencas: Moreover, discharge test results of constant current indicate that biomass-filled DCSOFCs have higher fuel utilization.
Titulo: Highly efficient direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells operated with camellia oleifera biomass

Sentencas: This study verifies the feasibility and potential of loading biomass directly into DC-SOFCs as a carbon source, and reveals that, compared with DC-SOFCs operated with biochar, biomassfilled DC-SOFCs can deliver remarkable electrochemical performance and stability.
Titulo: Highly efficient direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells operated with camellia oleifera biomass

Sentencas: Thus, a simpler and more convenient way to generate electricity through efficient and clean utilization of biomass energy is identified.
Titulo: Highly efficient direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells operated with camellia oleifera biomass
